text: @actionaiduganda @Mubangizi1995 @HellenTusuubira @RobertMuhangi2 The priority given to combating #Covid19 has seen the drop in the works and transport from 6.4 trn shs to 5.8 trn shs. This teaches that health, a BASIC right, should have been given priority over so many other things in the past years even without the pandemic. #ActionAidTalksUg

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
